name: Onlook
title: onlook.com
shortDescription: Onlook is a cutting-edge tool designed specifically for web and software designers. It allows users to own their code while providing a platform to build, design, and experiment interactively. An example use case is a designer using Onlook to adjust layouts, change colors, and modify text on a web application without any setup required, enhancing both productivity and creativity.
cons: Limited platform support (Apple Silicon & Windows only)

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Figma
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular for UI/UX design with collaboration features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Sketch
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Vector-based design tool for Mac users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adobe XD
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive toolset for design and prototyping
